page.title: 02Why Live in Whitminster?
page.content:
As a part of our survey we asked a number of the local children why they thought Whitminster was a pleasant place to live, or if they didn't like it.These are some of their impressions.
"Whitminster is a very quiet village and very clean. It is a happy village with friendly people".
"There is a lot of land to play on".
"Whitminster is a very quiet place except when the lorries go by".
"At night it is quite noisy because gangs go around shouting".
"In the Village Hall there are various events going on such as cubs and scouts, badminton and a youth club".
